QueryResult.text: SELECT a.id AS id, a.code AS unique_code, a.name AS name, b.type AS type, b.created_date AS created_date, b.last_updated_date AS last_updated_date FROM ODF_ABSTRACT_BLUEPRINTS a JOIN ODF_BLUEPRINTS b ON a.id = b.id WHERE b.blueprint_mode = 'PUBLISHED' AND (NULL IS NULL OR NLS_UPPER(NULL) = NLS_UPPER(b.TYPE)) AND (NULL IS NULL OR NLS_UPPER(NULL) = NLS_UPPER(b.CLASSIFIER)) AND b.IS_PRIVATE = 0 AND b.BLUEPRINT_LEVEL = 1 AND 1=1
